        Instantiates the unit with an initial X,Y, current health, maximum health, faction/loyalty data, and a name.
        Parameters:
        origX - Original and current X of the unit
        origY - Original and current Y of the unit
        currHealth - Current health of the unit
        maxHealth - Maximum amount of health for the unit
        data - The faction and loyalty data for the unit
        name - The unit's name
